Package com.library.frontend.controllers

Class LogInController

java.lang.Object
com.library.frontend.controllers.LogInController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LogInController extends Object implements Controller
The LogInController class is responsible for handling user login interactions in the library management system. It interacts with the backend LogInService to authenticate users and load appropriate scenes based on their roles.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the login controller. Sets focus on the username text field and configures button events.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The URL location.
      resources - The ResourceBundle.

    • logInButtonOnAction

      public void logInButtonOnAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when the login button is clicked or Enter key is pressed. Authenticates the user, sets the user in the SceneLoader, and loads the appropriate scene based on the user's role.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent associated with the login button click.

    • checkInput

      public void checkInput() throws IncorrectInputException
      Checks the input fields for correctness. Throws an IncorrectInputException if any input is missing.
      Throws:
      IncorrectInputException - If the username or password is blank.
